molgenis.name: example
molgenis.label: My MOLGENIS
molgenis.description: This is an minimal example database to show how MOLGENIS works. The purpose of this example database is to administrate experiment, samples, traits and measurements. The name='example' will result in a Java package 'example' being generated.

entity.name: Identifiable
entity.description: For modeling purposes only (denoted by abstract='true', this entity defines fields id and name centrally.

field.name: Date
field.description: Creation date, with an automatic default to 'today'

entity.name: Sample
entity.description: Samples that are part of an experiment.

field.name: Experiment
field.description: Samples are part-of one experiment (by cross reference to Experiment.id)

entity.name: Trait
entity.description: Traits that are studied in this experiment.

field.name: Molecular
field.description: Indication whether this is a molecular trait

field.name: Experiment
field.description: Traits are defined per experiment (by cross reference to Experiment.id)

entity.name: Data
entity.description: Data values (observations) of a measurement. Note: Data doesn't inherit from Identifiable because it has no unique name.

field.name: Sample
field.description: The sample this measurement is on

field.name: Trait
field.description: The trait this measurement is on

unique.description: There can be only one value per Sample X Trait

entity.name: AggregateData
entity.description: Data on multiple samples in one go.

field.name: Samples
field.description: The samples this measurement is on

field.name: Trait
field.description: The trait this measurement is on
